Regulation Name(s): Herpes Virus Nucleic Acid-Based Cutaneous and Mucocutaneous Lesion Panel
Specimen Container(s): Swab transport media (BD VTM, M4, M4RT, M5, M6, UTM)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin Molecular Simplexa HSV 1 & 2 Direct and Positive Control Pack for qualitative real-time PCR detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA from lesion swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 DNA in mucocutaneous and cutaneous lesion swabs from symptomatic patients, as an aid in the differential diagnosis of HSV-1 and HSV-2 infections; Positive Control Pack for use as assay control
